╔════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════╗ ║ XKM AUTOMATED RELEASE BUILD - QUICK REFERENCE ║ ╠════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════╣ ║ ║ ║ READY-TO-USE SCRIPTS ║ ║ ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── ║ ║ ║ ║ 1️⃣ build-release.bat ║ ║ Quick build without changelog prompt ║ ║ → Just double-click and go! ║ ║ ║ ║ 2️⃣ build-release-with-changelog.bat ║ ║ Build with changelog input ║ ║ → Enter changelog when prompted ║ ║ ║ ║ 3️⃣ test-telegram.bat ║ ║ Test Telegram bot connection ║ ║ → Verify before building ║ ║ ║ ╠════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════╣ ║ YOUR CONFIGURATION (Pre-configured) ║ ╠════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════╣ ║ ║ ║ Keystore: xkm-release-key.jks ║ ║ Alias: xkmkey ║ ║ Pass: gusti717 ║ ║ ║ ║ Telegram Group: -1002829293215 (Test Group) ║ ║ Bot Token: 8183726115:AAEpRJ5xsIoUG4VOGrr3JA4WRfV1fNoPuMU ║ ║ ║ ╠════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════╣ ║ WHAT HAPPENS WHEN YOU BUILD ║ ╠════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════╣ ║ ║ ║ 1. Validates keystore ║ ║ 2. Cleans previous builds ║ ║ 3. Builds signed release APK ║ ║ 4. Renames to XKM-[version].apk ║ ║ 5. Uploads to Telegram test group ║ ║ 6. Sends notification with: ║ ║ • App version & build info ║ ║ • System specs ║ ║ • SDK information ║ ║ • Changelog (if provided) ║ ║ ║ ║ ⏱️ Build Time: 2-5 minutes ║ ║ ║ ╠════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════╣ ║ OUTPUT LOCATIONS ║ ╠════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════╣ ║ ║ ║ Original: app\build\outputs\apk\release\app-release.apk ║ ║ Renamed: app\dist\XKM-2.0-Alpha-rc2.apk ║ ║ Uploaded: Telegram Test Group ║ ║ ║ ╠════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════╣ ║ ⚡ QUICK START ║ ╠════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════╣ ║ ║ ║ First time: ║ ║ 1. Run: test-telegram.bat ║ ║ 2. Check Telegram for test message ║ ║ 3. If OK, proceed to build ║ ║ ║ ║ Regular builds: ║ ║ • Fast: build-release.bat ║ ║ • With notes: build-release-with-changelog.bat ║ ║ ║ ╠════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════╣ ║ SECURITY ║ ╠════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════╣ ║ ║ ║ ✅ Scripts added to .gitignore (contain passwords) ║ ║ ✅ gradle.properties protected (Telegram credentials) ║ ║ ✅ Safe template provided: build-release.bat.template ║ ║ ║ ║ ⚠️ NEVER commit files with hardcoded credentials! ║ ║ ║ ╠════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════╣ ║ TROUBLESHOOTING ║ ╠════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════╣ ║ ║ ║ Keystore not found? ║ ║ → Check: C:\Users\putri\Documents\Project\XMS\ ║ ║ Keystore\Keystore-XKM\xkm-release-key.jks ║ ║ ║ ║ Build failed? ║ ║ → Fix code errors first ║ ║ → Close Android Studio if files locked ║ ║ ║ ║ Telegram failed? ║ ║ → Check internet connection ║ ║ → Run test-telegram.bat ║ ║ → APK must be < 200MB ║ ║ ║ ╠════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════╣ ║ MORE INFO ║ ╠════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════╣ ║ ║ ║ Read: BUILD-SCRIPTS-README.md ║ ║ • Detailed usage guide ║ ║ • Manual build commands ║ ║ • Complete troubleshooting ║ ║ ║ ╚════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════╝
TIP: Run test-telegram.bat first to verify everything works!
READY TO BUILD? Just double-click: build-release.bat
